description:
In a picture at Lusamine`s mansion, it can be seen with Lusamine`s kids when they were younger.
While under Nihilego control, it was sent out to stop them from rescuing Lusamine. Lillie said it was one of her mother`s cherished Pok√©mon. Lana, Mallow and Sophocles stayed back to battle it to allow Lillie to move ahead to get to her mother.
name: Dredear (Lusamine)
